issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description
Running 'ti info' with Windows Phone 8.1 simulators installed will throw errors due to the simulator version being unsupported.

h5.Steps To Reproduce
1. Install Windows Phone 8.1 simulators
2. Run 'ti info'

h5.Expected Result
Should list the installed emulators or display a message that they are not supported.

h5.Actual Result
Throws an error instead.
fields.summary: Windows Hybrid: ti info fails when Windows Phone 8.1 is installed
fields.environment:
Windows 8.1
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201406111952
Titanium SDK, build: 3.3.0.v20140613161751
Titanium CLI, build: 3.3.0-rc
Alloy: 1.4.0-rc

comments.body:
Master pull request: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/5805
3_3_X pull request: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/5806

To test, run {{ti info}} on a Windows machine that has VS2013, WP8, and WP8.1 SDKs installed.

Verified fixed on:
Windows 8.1
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201406111952
Titanium SDK, build: 3.3.0.v20140616174113
Titanium CLI, build: 3.3.0-rc
Alloy: 1.4.0-rc

ti.info ran successfully, correctly displaying my 8.1 simulators and devices.
Closing.
